titles.title: Global Service Fellowship Program Act of 2008
Global Service Fellowship Program Act of 2008
A bill to establish a Global Service Fellowship Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S791-792)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Dodd with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1045.

bill.summary:
2/7/2008--Introduced.
Global Service Fellowship Program Act of 2008 - Directs the Secretary of State to establish and administer a Global Service Fellowship Program to fund fellowships to promote international volunteering opportunities as a means of building bridges across cultures, addressing critical human needs, and promoting mutual understanding. Sets forth Program provisions. Authorizes appropriations.
